Example shift interventions matching lmtp style

Source: R/margot-shift-interventions.R
create_lmtp_style_shifts.Rd

Example shift interventions matching lmtp style

Usage

create_lmtp_style_shifts(
  min_score = 1,
  max_score = 7,
  baseline_wave = 0,
  shift_wave = 1
)

Arguments

min_score

Minimum score value

max_score

Maximum score value

baseline_wave

Wave to keep as observed (typically 0)

shift_wave

Wave to apply shift (typically 1)

Value

List containing shift_up and shift_down intervention functions

Examples

# Create lmtp-style shift interventions
shifts <- create_lmtp_style_shifts(
  min_score = 1,
  max_score = 7,
  baseline_wave = 0,
  shift_wave = 1
)

# Use in margot_simulate_causal
if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
results <- margot_simulate_causal(
  n = 1000,
  waves = 2,
  treatments = "a",
  interventions = list(
    natural = function(data, time, trt) data[[trt]],
    shift_up = shifts$shift_up,
    shift_down = shifts$shift_down
  )
)
} # }
